marklogic.body: 112. kate // . 2012.01.29 at 7:58 pm . back to the vitamix, i got stage 3 cancer, then my mom had cancer again, then died, and after the motor kept Overheating and then the blender part of the vitamix broke right , i am sorry, but i think there is nothing wrong with returning a brand new whole vitamix unopened, (i had bought two cuz i had thought it was good product and wanted to share with familyâ€¦.i respected costo research on products)â€¦. when i start getting my Act back together again, especially since in a normal year i spend 19,000 at costco. dont be so negative and all knowing, these posts are not all very nice or knowledgeable. or even helpful. 8-(
